description: What is your favorite product? Why?

answers.name: Micheal Lyons
answers.answer: Use the rule of three to answer this question. Pick three attributes and apply that to the product you like. Here is my approach to answering this question.My favorite product is Grammarly. When I think about why Grammarly as my favorite product, it comes down to three key points.

description: How many dentists are there in New York?

answers.name: Damien Braun
answers.answer: I would first confirm if the interviewer is referring to New York City or the state of New York. Assuming, they are referring to New York City, I know the population of NY is about 10M.
